attributes.description: NEW POSSIBILITIES: This 2018 Hyundai Accent 1.6 GL/Motion has generous features such as LED taillights, LED daytime running lights, forward collision warning, automatic emergency braking to name a few. The 2018 Accent has comfortable and supportive front seats and spacious rear seats that can easily fit two passengers on a long drive or five for a lunch run.  Material quality is good with padding strategically placed where your arms would fall and the dash and the door panels are made of hard plastic. Comfortable ride and impressively quiet cabin. Spacious interior with quality materials and excellent fit and finish. Very economical. All in all the 2018 Hyundai Accent sedan is roomier, safer and more fuel-efficient than before. With a full Dekra condition report and roadworthy and with great financing options on the floor, this may be your new possibility. Call us today for more information. Please note that the price does not include smash and grab and dealership fees.

attributes.description:
A compact and modern design makes the KIA Picanto perfect for your day-to-day urban driving.
Refreshing design
KIA have taken contemporary design to a new level in the Picanto! Combining a modern honeycomb grille with futuristic backward-swept lights, the design makes it stand out from other hatchbacks in its class. A compact build allows the KIA Picanto to fit in well with any inner-city environment, which invites you to drive with confidence.
Obsessed with peace of mind
From its sturdy frame to the latest in sensor technology, the Picanto is dedicated to protecting you when trouble happens and helps you avoid tricky situations in the first place
.

True Style lies within

It may be a compact car, but the Picanto’ s stylish interior gives you all the space you need to dash about town in comfort. And with ergonomically sound layout that places controls for driving, entertainment and temperature control at your fingertips, you'll never have to take your eyes off the road.
